title: Build Instagram-like social media app with chat, stories, reels, and follow system

requirements.text: Implement user account creation and authentication system with Internet Identity integration allowing users to create unique profiles with username, profile picture, and bio
acceptanceCriteria: Users can create accounts through Internet Identity
Each user has a unique username
Users can set and update profile pictures
Users can add and edit a bio/description
Profile information is stored persistently

requirements.text: Create a real-time chat messaging system enabling users to send and receive text messages with other users in private one-on-one conversations

quotes: baat kar sake chat kar sake

acceptanceCriteria: Users can initiate chat conversations with other users
Messages are delivered and displayed in chronological order
Chat history is preserved and retrievable
Users can view their list of active conversations
Message timestamps are displayed

requirements.text: Implement a stories feature allowing users to post temporary photo content that expires after 24 hours and is viewable by their followers
acceptanceCriteria: Users can upload and post story images
Stories automatically expire and disappear after 24 hours
Users can view stories from accounts they follow
Story viewer shows who posted and when
Multiple stories from the same user are grouped together

requirements.text: Create a reels feature for users to post and view short-form video content with a vertical scrolling feed interface
acceptanceCriteria: Users can upload video content as reels
Reels are displayed in a dedicated vertical scrolling feed
Each reel shows the creator's username and profile picture
Users can like and view engagement metrics on reels
Reels persist indefinitely on user profiles

requirements.text: Build a follow/unfollow system allowing users to follow and unfollow other users, with follower and following counts displayed on profiles
acceptanceCriteria: Users can follow other users with a single action
Users can unfollow users they are currently following
Follower count is displayed on user profiles
Following count is displayed on user profiles
Users can view lists of their followers and following

requirements.text: Design a vibrant, modern social media interface with engaging colors and clean typography that creates a welcoming, energetic atmosphere suitable for a content-sharing platform
acceptanceCriteria: Visual design uses a cohesive color palette with warm, inviting tones
Typography is clear and readable across all screen sizes
Layout follows modern social media design patterns
Interactive elements have clear visual feedback
Overall aesthetic feels fresh and contemporary

requirements.text: Create a home feed displaying posts, reels, and stories from followed users in a scrollable timeline with navigation to other sections like chat, profile, and explore
acceptanceCriteria: Home feed displays content from followed users
Navigation bar provides access to all major app sections
Content is organized in a clear, scrollable format
User can easily switch between different content types
Feed updates when new content is available

requirements.text: Render placeholder profile pictures and app branding assets as static frontend assets
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are served from frontend/public/assets/generated
Default profile picture placeholder is available
App logo and branding assets are integrated into the UI
Images load properly across all views

constraints: The app must use Internet Identity for authentication only, no third-party social login providers
Real-time chat and live updates are not supported by the platform architecture
Video upload and playback must be handled within platform constraints
The app cannot be directly published to PlayStore; it will be a web application accessible via browser
nonGoals: Native mobile app development for iOS or Android
Direct integration with external social media platforms
Video editing or filters within the application
Push notifications for new messages or interactions
Monetization features like ads or in-app purchases

required: Modern gradient app logo icon with overlapping circles or camera motif in coral and teal tones (app-logo.dim_256x256.png)
Default profile picture placeholder with neutral avatar silhouette on soft gradient background (default-avatar.dim_200x200.png)
Empty state illustration for when user has no posts yet, minimalist line art style (no-posts-placeholder.dim_400x300.png)
